entry.title: Tech Talk John Blog
entry.content:
Since the early days of the Internet, I have built several blogs from scratch or using blog technology du jour. This one is built using fastpages, which is a part of fast.ai’s tool kit.

Fastpages

Fastpages supports creating blog post using Jupyter Notebooks, Markdown, and Microsoft Word.

My preference is creating posts using GitHub Markdown. Fastpages runs on GitHub, it is relatively easy to use, and GitHub markdown has some features that other markdown dialects do not have.

GitHub Pages

Fastpages uses GitHuB Pages, a cast of creative APIs, and apps that compile and deploy blogs.
entry.summary: Since the early days of the Internet, I have built several blogs from scratch or using blog technology du jour. This one is built using fastpages, which is a part of fast.ai’s tool kit.
